int move = 10;
while(move!=0)
{
    setTopLeftPoint(new Point((int)getTopLeftPoint().getX(),
                              (int)getTopLeftPoint().getY() - 3));

    try
    {
        Thread.sleep(300);
    } catch (InterruptedException e)
    {
        // TODO Auto-generated catch block
        e.printStackTrace();
    }   
    move-=1;
}
